name: Blast - showdown battle
description:
Its a top down shooter game made using python.

In a evil dungeon you are the only one left, locked in a room and slimy monster are coming to eat you. The dungeon  has a holy blue fire which can grant you fire power but use it too much and if your energy get low enough you will freeze. The dungeon also has different fire power which will spawn time to time but as the fire power increase you will require more energy to handle it, use your fire power wisely as you have limited amount but you can kill with your dash.

If you want to get the raw python files you can get it on git hub

https://github.com/strikeraryu
